name: Staked ACME
description: stACME is an ERC-20 token, issued by Accumulated Finance and representing the staked ACME on the Accumulate protocol. Accumulated Finance is a liquid staking and DeFi platform for the Accumulate protocol and ACME/WACME token. Native ACME staked in liquid staking are held in accumulated.acme multi-signature staking account. stACME tokens staked on Accumulated Finance will earn the Accumulate protocolâ€™s staking APR. Additionally it's possible to provide stACME liquidity into stACME/WACME Curve pool to earn additional rewards.
